item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Robert Dennard, DRAM Pioneer, has died (177 points | 18 comments)
2. The Unraveling of Space-Time (27 points | 19 comments)
3. Sequencing wastewater may be key to getting a grip on the H5N1 bird flu outbreak (14 points | 1 comment)
4. Were RNNs all we needed? (305 points | 132 comments)
5. Why does man print "gimme gimme gimme" at 00:30? (2017) (37 points | 12 comments)
6. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (656 points | 487 comments)
7. Correcting the Record for Pear and Continue (44 points | 9 comments)
8. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (246 points | 130 comments)
9. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (853 points | 277 comments)
10. The Heart of Unix (2018) (99 points | 43 comments)
11. Go Concurrency vs. RxJS (12 points | 3 comments)
12. Serving 70B-scale LLMs efficiently on low-resource edge devices [pdf] (218 points | 54 comments)
13. Cox slows Internet speeds in entire neighborhoods to punish any heavy users (189 points | 118 comments)
14. DOSBox-X: Enhanced Fork of DOSBox for Expanded DOS and Retro PC Support (62 points | 17 comments)
15. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (107 points | 28 comments)
16. Personal Names Around the World (2011) (16 points | 2 comments)
17. Why does Lisp use cons cells? (1998) (10 points | 4 comments)
18. Why and how we’re migrating many of our servers from Linux to the BSDs (92 points | 26 comments)
19. Perfctl: A Stealthy Malware Targeting Linux Servers (7 points | 3 comments)
20. Show HN: Zero – DX focused non framework to interact with the DOM (13 points | discuss)
21. Mux (YC W16) is hiring a video engineer ( | hide)
22. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (147 points | 160 comments)
23. Solving methane mysteries with satellite imagery (113 points | 20 comments)
24. Skymont: Intel’s E-Cores reach for the Sky (26 points | 5 comments)
25. HTTrack Website Copier (64 points | 14 comments)
26. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (33 points | 10 comments)
27. SiteOne Crawler – big tool with no users (10 points | 2 comments)
28. Show HN: Screensavers for your terminal (Bevy/Ratatui) (23 points | 5 comments)
29. Interviewing for Evidence (5 points | discuss)
30. I added a fun random ASCII art welcome screen to Vim (5 points | 1 comment)
